nodes.text: Yar Togna was a foul-smelling, high-gravity planet with a toxic, fume-saturated atmosphere that was the homeworld of the Tognath species. It was conquered and occupied by the Galactic Empire, resulting in a mass exodus of its inhabitants, including two notable eggmates, Edrio and Benthic.

Yar Togna was first mentioned in an official description for Edrio "Two Tubes," a character created and developed for the 2016 film Rogue One: A Star Wars Story, on the official Star Wars Facebook page on July 20, 2016.
